query.name: usersActivities
query.jpql: select e from uactivity$Activity e where e.assignedUser.id = :currentUserId and e.status = :activeStatusId and e.type.code = :notificationCode order by e.createTs desc

query.name: myProfile
query.jpql: select p from base$PersonExt p where p.group.id = :userId

query.name: personGroupInfo
query.jpql: select p from tsadv$UserExt u inner join u.personGroup p inner join p.assignments a where u.id = :userId and a.startDate <= CURRENT_DATE and a.endDate >= CURRENT_DATE and a.primaryFlag = true

query.name: kpiEditPage
query.jpql: select app from tsadv$AssignedPerformancePlan app left join app.assignedPerson ap left join ap.assignments a where app.id = :appId and a.startDate <= CURRENT_DATE and a.endDate >= CURRENT_DATE and a.primaryFlag = true

query.name: kpiAssignedGoals
query.jpql: select ag from tsadv$AssignedGoal ag where ag.assignedPerformancePlan.id = :appId order by ag.category.order, ag.weight desc

query.name: myAbsences
query.jpql: select e from tsadv$Absence e where e.personGroup.id = :session$userPersonGroupId order by e.dateFrom desc

query.name: myAbsenceRequests
query.jpql: select e from tsadv$AbsenceRequest e where e.personGroup.id = :session$userPersonGroupId order by e.requestNumber desc

query.name: myProfileFull
query.jpql: select p from base$PersonGroupExt p where p.id = :userId

query.name: searchCourses
query.jpql: select distinct c from tsadv$DicCategory c join c.courses cc where (lower (cc.name) like lower (concat(concat('%', :courseName), '%')))

query.name: searchEnrollments
query.jpql: select distinct c from tsadv$DicCategory c join c.courses cc join cc.enrollments e where e.personGroup.id = :userId

query.name: searchEnrollments
query.jpql: select c from tsadv$DicCategory c join c.courses cc join cc.enrollments e where (lower ( cc.name) like :courseName) and e.personGroup.id = :userId

query.name: enrollment
query.jpql: select e from tsadv$Enrollment e left join e.course c left join c.sections s left join s.courseSectionAttempts a ON a.enrollment.id = :id where e.id = :id

query.name: kpiTeam
query.jpql: select app from tsadv$AssignedPerformancePlan app join app.assignedPerson ap join ap.assignments a join a.positionGroup p join base$HierarchyElementExt he ON he.positionGroup.id = p.id join he.parent parent join parent.positionGroup pp join pp.assignments pa join pa.personGroup pap where a.assignmentStatus.code = 'ACTIVE' and a.startDate <= CURRENT_DATE and a.endDate >= CURRENT_DATE and a.primaryFlag = true and pa.assignmentStatus.code = 'ACTIVE' and pa.startDate <= CURRENT_DATE and pa.endDate >= CURRENT_DATE and pa.primaryFlag = true and pap.id = :personGroupId and (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM app.endDate) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE))

query.name: kpiTeamPerformancePlans
query.jpql: select pplan from tsadv$PerformancePlan pplan join tsadv$AssignedPerformancePlan app on pplan.id = app.performancePlan.id join app.assignedPerson ap join ap.assignments a join a.positionGroup p join base$HierarchyElementExt he ON he.positionGroup.id = p.id join he.parent parent join parent.positionGroup pp join pp.assignments pa join pa.personGroup pap where a.assignmentStatus.code = 'ACTIVE' and a.startDate <= CURRENT_DATE and a.endDate >= CURRENT_DATE and a.primaryFlag = true and pa.assignmentStatus.code = 'ACTIVE' and pa.startDate <= CURRENT_DATE and pa.endDate >= CURRENT_DATE and pa.primaryFlag = true and pap.id = :personGroupId

query.name: kpiTeamPerformancePlan
query.jpql: select app from tsadv$AssignedPerformancePlan app join app.assignedPerson ap join ap.assignments a join a.positionGroup p join base$HierarchyElementExt he ON he.positionGroup.id = p.id join he.parent parent join parent.positionGroup pp join pp.assignments pa join pa.personGroup pap where a.assignmentStatus.code = 'ACTIVE' and a.startDate <= CURRENT_DATE and a.endDate >= CURRENT_DATE and a.primaryFlag = true and pa.assignmentStatus.code = 'ACTIVE' and pa.startDate <= CURRENT_DATE and pa.endDate >= CURRENT_DATE and pa.primaryFlag = true and pap.id = :personGroupId and app.performancePlan.id = :performancePlanId

query.name: bprocUsers
query.jpql: select u from tsadv$UserExt u join u.personGroup pg where u.active = true

query.name: books
query.jpql: select d from tsadv$DicBookCategory d join d.books b order by d.order

query.name: positionGroupGoals
query.jpql: select g from tsadv$PositionGroupGoalLink e inner join e.goal g where e.positionGroup.id = :positionGroupId

query.name: courseFeedbacks
query.jpql: select e from tsadv$LearningFeedbackTemplate e where e.id in (select cft.feedbackTemplate.id from tsadv$CourseFeedbackTemplate cft where cft.course.id = :courseId and :systemDate between cft.startDate and cft.endDate) and e.active = True and e.employee = True and e.usageType = :usageType
